languages.text: {n}Вскоре умиротворение отступает, возвращая престол торжествующей плоти, укутывающей разум в привычную оболочку из жил и костей.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: черный экран заканчивается, снова видим ванную
черный экран заканчивается, снова видим ванную

languages.text: {n}This moment of serenity soon fades. The body reclaims the mind, binding it once more to the familiar shell of flesh, sinew, and bone.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вскоре умиротворение отступает, возвращая престол торжествующей плоти, укутывающей разум в привычную оболочку из жил и костей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Soon, the serenity passes, yielding the throne to the victorious flesh that once again clads the mind in a familiar shell of sinew and bone.{/n}
{n}Soon, the serenity passes, yielding the throne to the victorious flesh that once again clads the mind in a familiar shell of sinew and bone.{/n}
{n}This moment of serenity soon fades. The body reclaims the mind, binding it once more to the familiar shell of flesh, sinew, and bone.{/n}

{n}This moment of serenity soon fades. The body reclaims the mind, binding it once more to the familiar shell of flesh, sinew, and bone.{/n}
{n}This moment of serenity soon fades. The body reclaims the mind, binding it once more to the familiar shell of flesh, sinew, and bone.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ce moment de sérénité s'achève trop rapidement. Le corps reprend son emprise sur l'esprit pour le lier à nouveau à cette enveloppe familière de chair, de tendons et d'os.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This moment of serenity soon fades. The body reclaims the mind, binding it once more to the familiar shell of flesh, sinew, and bone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ce moment de sérénité s'achève trop rapidement. Le corps reprend son emprise sur l'esprit pour le lier à nouveau à cette enveloppe familière de chair, de tendons et d'os.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El momento de serenidad pronto se desvanece. El cuerpo recupera su mente, devolviéndola a su caparazón familiar de carne, nervio y hueso.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This moment of serenity soon fades. The body reclaims the mind, binding it once more to the familiar shell of flesh, sinew, and bone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El momento de serenidad pronto se desvanece. El cuerpo recupera su mente, devolviéndola a su caparazón familiar de carne, nervio y hueso.{/n}

languages.text: {n}片刻的宁静很快结束了，肉体再次夺回了控制权。你熟悉的肌肉、筋腱与骨骼再次回到了你的身体。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This moment of serenity soon fades. The body reclaims the mind, binding it once more to the familiar shell of flesh, sinew, and bone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}片刻的宁静很快结束了，肉体再次夺回了控制权。你熟悉的肌肉、筋腱与骨骼再次回到了你的身体。{/n}

languages.text: {n}静かな瞬間はすぐに終わった。肉体が心を取り戻し、肉と筋と骨という慣れ親しんだ殻に再び心を縛り付ける。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This moment of serenity soon fades. The body reclaims the mind, binding it once more to the familiar shell of flesh, sinew, and bone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}静かな瞬間はすぐに終わった。肉体が心を取り戻し、肉と筋と骨という慣れ親しんだ殻に再び心を縛り付ける。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der kurze Moment des Friedens schwindet bald. Der Körper erobert den Geist zurück und bindet ihn wieder an die vertraute Hülle aus Fleisch, Sehnen und Knochen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This moment of serenity soon fades. The body reclaims the mind, binding it once more to the familiar shell of flesh, sinew, and bone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der kurze Moment des Friedens schwindet bald. Der Körper erobert den Geist zurück und bindet ihn wieder an die vertraute Hülle aus Fleisch, Sehnen und Knochen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bu berraklık anı kısa sürede sona eriyor. Beden, zihni yeniden ele geçiriyor ve onu bir kez daha etten, kastan ve kemikten oluşan o tanıdık kabuğa yerleştiriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This moment of serenity soon fades. The body reclaims the mind, binding it once more to the familiar shell of flesh, sinew, and bone.{/n}
